## PluginManifest interface

Metadata about a Community plugin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PluginManifest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [`author`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PluginManifest/author.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The author's name. |
|  [`authorUrl?`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PluginManifest/authorUrl.md) |  | <code>string</code> | _(Optional)_ A URL to the author's website. |
|  [`description`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PluginManifest/description.md) |  | <code>string</code> | A description of the plugin. |
|  [`dir?`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PluginManifest/dir.md) |  | <code>string</code> | _(Optional)_ Vault path to the plugin folder in the config directory. |
|  [`id`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PluginManifest/id.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The plugin ID. |
|  [`isDesktopOnly?`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PluginManifest/isDesktopOnly.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | _(Optional)_ Whether the plugin can be used only on desktop. |
|  [`minAppVersion`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PluginManifest/minAppVersion.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The minimum required Obsidian version to run this plugin. |
|  [`name`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PluginManifest/name.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The display name. |
|  [`version`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PluginManifest/version.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The current version, using . |
